description:
Here at the law office of Lesnevich, Marzano-Lesnevich, O'Cathain & O'Cathain, LLC, in Hackensack, New Jersey, we are fully dedicated to helping you and your family through your difficult and uncertain times. Serving clients throughout Bergen County and the surrounding areas, we strive to provide the quality, personalized representation you need to help increase your chances of obtaining the favorable outcome you deserve for your legal challenge involving any of the following:

  • Family law and divorce
  • Personal injury

Backed by our decades of combined legal experience, the attorneys at our law firm possess the extensive knowledge and resources necessary to help you make the best-informed decisions about the matters that affect your case. Working directly with you, we will discuss your options and set about to devise a customized strategy that will give you the best possible odds of achieving the solutions you seek efficiently.

We genuinely care about you and your needs, and this passion shows through everything we do to assist and support you during these trying times in your life. Whether you seek to recover the full amount of compensation for the damages you suffered as the result of someone else's negligence or if you are going through a divorce, you can trust that the attorneys at Lesnevich, Marzano-Lesnevich, O'Cathain & O'Cathain, LLC, will be your personal legal advocates.

To find out more about how we can best serve you while helping you secure a brighter future for yourself and your loved ones, you can schedule a free initial consultation by calling our office or visiting our law firm's website to set up an appointment.
